channel.title: Ip problem
channel.description:
Hi there. My problem is that I can't connect to my no ip. I start the server, then the client with ip changer. I put "blablabla(no ip ip)", and then it stucks at connecting to server. But if I put localhost or 127.0.0.1, it will connect :(
Hope I get an answer. Thanks! :)

item.title: Ip problem
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

We do not help with portforwarding, etc. questions here. This is for server help.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip problem
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

it doesnt always let the same comp connect to its own host on the same computer.

if you wanted to connect to your server, then go on another computer and use your no-ip.

some people (like me) i can login with no-ip or 0.0.0.0, its just how your computer works, just use 0.0.0.0 or dont login at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip problem

item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“megaxx, post:3, topic:268061”]I will now ^^
Thanks for remembering and for the quick answer.

C ya mate.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2009, 02:19:06 pm[/size][hr]Portforwarded and didn’t work.
At least it made some progress. In the server’s .bat, it appears that i tried to connect.

Any more help please?[/quote]

i dont understand

Read full topic
